DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate performance fanfilcon A lens worn daily wear modality approximately 1 month comparison lotrafilcon B lens .
DOC.brief_title: A Dispensing Clinical Fanfilcon A Lens Against Lotrafilcon B Lens Over 1 Month Wear Per Lens
DOC.detailed_description: This 45 subject , 1-month dispensing , crossover , double-masked , randomize , bilateral study compare test lens control lens . Both test control lenses use daily wear modality 1 month .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is least 17 year age full legal capacity volunteer ; Has read sign information consent letter ; Is willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule ; Is correctable visual acuity 20/30 better ( eye ) habitual correction assign study lens ; Is adapt soft contact lens wearer ( For purpose study : Current lens wear least 3 day per week , 8 hour day ) ; Demonstrates acceptable fit study lenses . A person exclude study he/she : Is participate concurrent clinical research study ; Is habitual wearer lotrafilcon B enfilcon A lens . Has know active* ocular disease and/or infection ; Has systemic condition opinion investigator may affect study outcome variable ; Is use systemic topical medication opinion investigator may affect study outcome variable ; Has know sensitivity diagnostic pharmaceutical use study ; Is pregnant , lactate plan pregnancy time enrollment ; ( verbal confirmation Screening Visit ) Is aphakic ; Has undergone refractive error surgery ; For purpose study , active ocular disease define infection inflammation require therapeutic treatment . Mild ( i.e . consider clinically relevant ) lid abnormality ( blepharitis , meibomian gland dysfunction , papilla ) , corneal conjunctival stain dry eye consider active ocular disease . Neovascularization corneal scar result previous hypoxia , infection inflammation therefore active .
